courses.name: Master of Data Science
courses.description: A comprehensive program covering machine learning, big data analytics, and statistical modeling.
courses.career_prospects: Data Scientist, ML Engineer, Business Analyst, Research Scientist
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's degree in relevant field, programming experience

courses.name: Bachelor of Commerce
courses.description: Flexible business degree with majors in accounting, finance, marketing, and management.
courses.career_prospects: Accountant, Financial Analyst, Marketing Manager, Business Consultant
courses.prerequisites: High school completion with English and Math

courses.name: Master of Computer Science
courses.description: Advanced program in theoretical and applied computer science from one of Canada's top universities.
courses.career_prospects: Software Engineer, Systems Architect, Research Scientist, Tech Lead
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's in CS or related field, strong GPA

courses.name: Master of Mechanical Engineering
courses.description: World-class engineering program with specializations in automotive, aerospace, and robotics.
courses.career_prospects: Mechanical Engineer, R&D Engineer, Project Manager, Consultant
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's in Engineering, German B2 or English C1

courses.name: Global MBA
courses.description: Prestigious MBA program with a focus on global business and Asian markets.
courses.career_prospects: Business Manager, Strategy Consultant, Entrepreneur, Executive
courses.prerequisites: Bachelor's degree, 2+ years work experience, GMAT/GRE
